main event: Unidentified aerial object observed in Highland Park, Illinois on 30 June 1961.
interesting points: The object observed was round, the size of an egg, and emitted a white glow., The sighting lasted for 30 seconds., The witness indicated that the object's position resembled that of a star in the sky., There are characteristics of a star sighting based on the witness's statement., The coordinating report from another sighting included details of a large glow in the sky observed by the witness and family.
sighted object: round object with a white glow
witness description: A person reported by an Intel Tech and six family members who confirmed the sighting
